summary: A comprehensive pytest-based test suite for the ANSYS MAPDL Python package, covering command handling, geometry creation, mesh operations, licensing, logging, gRPC communication, plotting, post‑processing, solution extraction, component management, launcher behavior, DPF integration, and various utility functions to validate the correctness and robustness of the library.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability, accuracy, and compliance of the MAPDL Python interface for engineering simulation workflows, enabling users to trust the software for design analysis, automation, and integration with ANSYS tools.
